review: Dr. Tanuja is a highly professional and experienced gynaecologist. I was going through a high risk pregnancy and she made sure to provide me with the best treatment available. She was very responsive to my questions both in messages and in person. She would always calmly clarify my doubts. I would say she is one of the best gynaecologist and I have happily delivered a baby girl through her guidance and I will highly recommend her.
